topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/553c7b156368722288200000#post_553c7b156368722288200000
Fucking thank you.

I semi-quit when they started legitimately believing that sjw were going to take over the usa.

"But they have a lot of power and they're gaining political control"
"Yeah they have a lot of political power, but they're a c rank political group that has no way in hell of taking control of congress"
"But they have money!"
"So does the koch brothers and they haven't been able to take control of the entire world"
"But they might <insert here> and succeed!"

There's only two people left on the thread that have their head on them and the rest will call you a wackjob for believing that third wavers won't take over the world.

I know I have a tendency for hyperbole and not logical, but almost everyone on that thread makes me look sane in comparison.
